## Load
```{r echo=FALSE}
source("~/research/.passwords.R")
```
```{r}
library(codebook)
library(dplyr)
```
```{r cache=TRUE, warning = FALSE, message=F}
library(formr)
formr::formr_connect(email = credentialslua$email, password = credentialslua$password)
results = formr::formr_results("s2_initial", compute_alphas = F, plot_likert = F, quiet = T)

# results = results %>% filter(!duplicated(cbind(session, created))) #%>% filter(1:5000) %>% select(1:100)
rm(credentials, credentialslua)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw())
knitr::opts_chunk$set(error = TRUE)
```

```{r}
codebook(results)
```
